extension.name: Specific to Aqua Paris Plongée
extension.description: Some features specific to Aqua Paris Plongée website
extension.comments: Among functionnalities: error handler to force login; overwrite of pdf export to sort by name, CiviruleConditions for events, list of participant name and role, export mail list of a group to file, update a date field according to an other one (CACI expiration date), set and delete public emaila nd phone (principal -> publique).
